Articles.Content:
Ship, orbit, ap ect. are not showing at all in career mode anymore. I tried load up another savegame in sandbox mode, problem gone. Bone of the bugs was not there from start so it has something todo with career. No mods, all vanilla and game is currently up to date. Also had 2 crashes but didnt save any info on those.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KWDrYf-icnE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Ah I think I know what this is, your vessel filter for the vessel you are using is off, go to the map and mouse over the top edge of the screen.
